Deadlines and delay consequence: The Author shall deliver the completed manuscript of the Work to the Publisher within six (6) months from the date of this Agreement.
Copyright ownership and permissions: The Author shall retain the copyright to the Work.
Non-compete agreement: The Author shall not publish any competing work on the same subject matter as the Work for a period of two (2) years from the date of publication of the Work.
Intellectual property: The Author warrants that the Work is original and does not infringe on any copyright or other intellectual property rights.
Royalty payments and dispute resolution: The Author shall receive a royalty of 10% of the net sales of the Work.
Conditions for termination of the contra: Either Party may terminate this Agreement upon written notice to the other Party or in case the Publisher deems a situation as infringement of agreement.
Distribution rights and territories: The Author grants to the Publisher the exclusive right to publish the Work in all languages and formats, including but not limited to print, digital, and audiobook formats.

Royalty payments and dispute resolution: The Publisher shall pay the Author the following royalties on the Publisher's Net Receipts: (1) Hardcover sales in the United States and Canada: (i) 15% on the first 10,000 units; (ii) 17% on units 10,001 to 20,000; (iii) 20% on all units thereafter.
Conditions for termination of the contra: The Publisher may terminate this Agreement if the Author fails to deliver satisfactory materials, if publication may result in legal liability, if market conditions change, or if the Author loses their professional license.

Publisher first refusal rights on future: The Author shall submit a proposal for their next work to the Publisher before offering it to others. The Publisher shall notify the Author within 60 days if it wishes to publish the next work, and the Parties shall negotiate terms in good faith.
Reversal of rights to editor: If the Publisher decides that the Work is no longer commercially available, it shall revert all rights to the Author after 6 months.

Trade paperback: 15% on the first 10,000 units, 18% thereafter.  Foreign sales: 7.5%.  Electronic form: 18%.  Lower priced editions: 7.5%.  Sales at high discounts: 5%.  On-demand sales: 5%.  Subsidiary rights: 50% if licensed to third parties, 7.5% if undertaken by the Publisher.  Adaptations and derivative works: 7.5%.
